title: When are teams locked into 10th place in NA LCS?
body: I'm more curious about the bottom of the league than the top of the league right now, with the automatic relegation. How close are we to a team in NA LCS being guaranteed 10th place (and relegation)?

replies.body: coast was guaranteed last place at the beginning of last week.

It seems like 10 is the perfect number i which #10 is significantly worse than the other teams

Even in EU when there was a tie for last, Giants were going to win anyways cuz their mid actually got skilz and MYM was the team that got 3rd in EU last year but didn't go to worlds after losing to ROC in Quarters

i just don't hope that if a top tier team like CLG get relegated they don't just retire like HotshotGG

The Meet Your Makers team at the end of the season was a lot better than the one at the beginning.  The switch from Supa Hot Crew over to their new organization had a bunch of issues.  Noxiak and Jwaow only had a few games to pull them out of the massive slump and it wasn't fast enough.

I think Giants is very weak and LowLandLions White is going to rip them apart in the promotion tournament.  We'll see though, but even as good as Pepinero is he's the only one making stuff happen.  If they can't find a way to activate Werlyb/Adryh they'll be in Challenger against MYM...  If they can't find some mid/late shot calling they just sort of walk around in circles face checking bushes until the game is over.
All of the fks, and I don't understand.
